list.title: lib/model.module:js
list.description: Class holding the atomic models to be plotted

list.description: Add a text label to the atom.

list.description: Aura used to highlight this atom image

list.description: Starting radius of the atom

list.description: All bonds connected to this atom

list.description: Bonds to this atom

list.description: Color of the atom

list.description: Hex integer code of the conventional CPK color used for this element (altered in case of non-standard isotopes)

list.description: Crystal site label of this atom

list.description: Symbol of this atom's element

list.description: Fractional coordinates of this atom's original

list.description: Get the value for one array for this image

list.description: Whether the atom is highlighted

list.description: String ID of the image

list.description: Cell indices of this atom image

list.description: Index of this image

list.description: Index of the atom

list.description: Atomic mass of this atom's isotope

list.description: Information for this atom's isotope

list.title: lib/model.module:js~AtomImage#isotopeGlobal
list.description: Atomic mass of the global isotope set as default for this atom's species

list.description: Retrieve or set a label's properties

list.description: Mesh corresponding to this atom image

list.description: Model this atom belongs to

list.description: Index of the molecule this atom belongs to

list.description: Atomic number of element

list.title: lib/model.module:js~AtomImage#opacity
list.description: Opacity of the atom

list.description: Final radius of the atom (starting radius * scale)

list.description: Remove the ellipsoid with a given name

list.description: Remove the label of a given name

list.description: Renderer used by this atom

list.title: lib/model.module:js~AtomImage#scale
list.description: Scale of the atom

list.description: Index of the species of this atom

list.description: Van dew Waals radius for this element

list.description: Whether the atom is visible

list.description: Position of this atom image

list.description: Position of this atom's original

list.description: A unique string key used to quickly reference the bond

list.description: Mesh corresponding to this bond image

list.description: Model this bond belongs to

list.description: First opacity of the bond

list.description: Second opacity of the bond

list.description: Radius of the bond

list.description: Renderer used by this bond

list.title: lib/model.module:js~BondImage#visible
list.description: Whether the bond is visible

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model
list.description: An object containing an Atomic structure and taking care of its periodic nature, allowing querying and selection, and so on.

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#absToFrac
list.description: Convert absolute coordinates to fractional

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#addLink
list.description: Add link drawn on model

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#addSphere
list.description: Add a sphere drawn on model

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#all
list.description: ModelView containing all the atoms of the image

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#atoms
list.description: Atom images in this model

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#axes
list.description: Graphical object representing the unit cell's axes

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#box
list.description: Graphical object representing the unit cell's box

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#cell
list.description: Unit cell of the model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#clearGraphics
list.description: Remove all graphical objects

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#crystalLabels
list.description: Crystallographic labels of each atom

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#deleteArray
list.description: Delete an array from the underlying Atoms object

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#find
list.description: Find a group of atoms based on a given query and return as AtomImages

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#fracToAbs
list.description: Convert fractional coordinates to absolute

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#getArray
list.description: Retrieve an array from the underlying Atoms object

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#hasArray
list.description: Check if an array exists in the underlying Atoms object

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#info
list.description: Additional information from the model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#length
list.description: Number of atoms in this model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#minimumSupercell
list.description: Compute and return the minimum supercell that guarantees containing all atoms at a maximum distance r from those in the [0,0,0] cell.

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#numbers
list.description: Atomic numbers in this model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#pbc
list.description: Periodic boundary conditions

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#periodic
list.description: Whether this model is periodic in all three directions of space

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#positions
list.description: Coordinates of the atoms in this model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#removeGraphics
list.description: Remove the graphical object with a given name

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#renderer
list.description: Renderer used for this model's graphics

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#scaledPositions
list.description: Fractional coordinates of the atoms in this model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#setArray
list.description: Set an array for the underlying Atoms object

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#speciesIndices
list.description: Indices of each atom by their species (e.g. C1, C2, H1, C3, H2, etc.)

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#supercell
list.description: Shape of the supercell for this model

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#supercellGrid
list.description: Full grid of origin coordinates of the cells making up the supercell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#symbols
list.description: Chemical symbols in this model's original cell

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#vdwElementScaling
list.description: Table of scaling factors by element for Van der Waals radii

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#vdwScaling
list.description: Global scaling factor for Van der Waals radii

list.title: lib/model.module:js~Model#view
list.description: Create a new ModelView for this model, using a given list of indices

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js
list.description: Class holding "model views", subsets of atoms in a Model used for selection or to perform operations in block

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#addEllipsoids
list.description: Add ellipsoids to the atom images in this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#addLabels
list.description: Add labels to the atom images in this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#and
list.description: Intersection with another ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#atoms
list.description: Atom images in this view

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#elements
list.description: Get sorted set of unique elements in the ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#ellipsoidProperties
list.description: Get or set ellipsoids' properties for the atom images in this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#find
list.description: Perform a further search within the atoms included in this ModelView.

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#hide
list.description: Make all atoms in the view invisible. Can be chained

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#indices
list.description: Indices of the atom images in this view

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#labelProperties
list.description: Get or set labels' properties for the atom images in this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#length
list.description: Number of atom images in this view

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#map
list.description: Run a function on each AtomImage, returning an Array of the results.

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#model
list.description: Model used by this view

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#not
list.description: Complement to this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#or
list.description: Union with another ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#remove
list.description: Remove all atoms in mview from the current view

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#removeEllipsoids
list.description: Remove ellipsoids from the atom images in this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#removeLabels
list.description: Remove labels from the atom images in this ModelView

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#setProperty
list.description: Set some property of the atoms within the ModelView.

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#show
list.description: Make all atoms in the view visible. Can be chained

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#uniqueSites
list.description: Unique atoms in the current view (based on site labels)

list.title: lib/modelview.module:js~ModelView#xor
list.description: Exclusive OR with another ModelView

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js
list.description: Class constituting the main object that plots crystals in the webpage

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis
list.description: An object providing a full interface to a renderer for crystallographic models

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#addNotification
list.description: Add a notification to the list of notifications to be displayed

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#addNotifications
list.description: Adds all notifications to the drawing

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#addPrimitive
list.description: Add a primitive shape to the drawing

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#centerCamera
list.description: Center the camera on a given point

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#clearNotifications
list.description: Removes notifications from the drawing

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#deleteModel
list.description: Erase a model from the recorded ones

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#displayModel
list.description: Render a model

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#displayed
list.description: Displayed atoms

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#getScreenshotData
list.description: Recover a data URL of a PNG screenshot of the current scene

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#highlightSelected
list.description: Whether the selected atoms should be highlighted with auras

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#loadModels
list.description: Load one or more atomic models from a file's contents

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#model
list.description: Currently loaded model

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#modelList
list.description: List of loaded models

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#modelName
list.description: Name of the currently loaded model

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#onAtomBox
list.description:
Set a callback function for an event where a user drags a box around multiple atoms. The function should take as arguments a ModelView including the atoms in the box:

function callback(view) { ... }

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#onAtomClick
list.description:
Set a callback function for an event where a user clicks on an atom. The function should take as arguments the atom image for the clicked atom and the event object:

function callback(atom, event) { ... }

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#reloadModel
list.description: Reload a model, possibly with new parameters

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#removePrimitive
list.description: Remove a primitive shape from the drawing

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#selected
list.description: Selected atoms

list.title: lib/visualizer.module:js~CrystVis#theme
list.description: Theme
